main event: A large, glowing, disc-shaped object was observed hovering over the RCA Victor plant in Camden, New Jersey on July 3, 1950.
interesting points: The object was approximately 100 feet in diameter and emitting a bluish-green glow.
The object was observed for approximately 10 minutes before accelerating rapidly and disappearing from sight.
No other details or witnesses could be obtained.
The sighting is classified as UNIDENTIFIED by the Office of Special Investigations.
The report was received by the Office of Special Investigations at Wright-Patterson Air Force Base on July 6, 1950.
